name: [PROJECT_NAME]-test-website
description: Test website harness for Salesforce Embedded Messaging integration

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:js-integration && npm run build:html-integration && npm run build:static
scripts.build:js: babel src/realfast.js --out-file dist/realfast.babel.js --source-maps && sed '/^export {/,/^};$/d' dist/realfast.babel.js > dist/realfast.js && rm dist/realfast.babel.js dist/realfast.babel.js.map
scripts.build:js-integration: babel src/integration.js --out-file dist/integration.babel.js --source-maps && sed '/^export {/,/^};$/d' dist/integration.babel.js > dist/integration.js && rm dist/integration.babel.js dist/integration.babel.js.map
scripts.build:html: BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) COMMIT=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BUILD_TIME=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") && sed -e "s/__GIT_BRANCH__/$BRANCH/g" -e "s/__GIT_COMMIT__/$COMMIT/g" -e "s/__BUILD_TIME__/$BUILD_TIME/g" index.html > dist/index.html
scripts.build:html-integration: BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) COMMIT=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BUILD_TIME=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") && sed -e "s/__GIT_BRANCH__/$BRANCH/g" -e "s/__GIT_COMMIT__/$COMMIT/g" -e "s/__BUILD_TIME__/$BUILD_TIME/g" integration.html > dist/integration.html
